intro: Schismatoglottis bolivariana, commonly known as the Bolivian schismatoglottis, is a species of flowering plant in the family Orchidaceae. Its leaves are typically broad and heart-shaped, with a waxy texture that helps it retain moisture in its natural habitat. Schismatoglottis bolivariana is often grown as an ornamental plant due to its unique appearance and relatively low maintenance requirements.
